parameters.content:
## YouTube Channel Settings Audit

**Comprehensive check of your channel's optimization.**

### What This Checks

âœ… **Branding (65 points)**
- Profile picture
- Channel banner
- Watermark

âœ… **Channel Info (40 points)**
- Description quality
- Custom URL
- Country & language settings

âœ… **Settings (30 points)**
- Channel keywords
- Channel trailer
- Featured channels

âœ… **Recent Videos (30 points)**
- Title optimization
- Description quality
- Tag usage

### Setup

1. Connect YouTube OAuth2 credentials to all 3 HTTP Request nodes
2. Run workflow
3. Check "Format Report" output for detailed analysis

### Score Guide

- **80-100**: Excellent optimization
- **60-79**: Good, minor improvements
- **40-59**: Needs work
- **0-39**: Critical issues

### Next Step

Use the **AI-Powered Channel Optimizer** workflow to fix issues automatically.
